Pre-Game Insights: The HITMAN joins hands with Gautam Gambhir for the first time as the duo hits the drawing board to build a team for the ICC Champions Trophy in 2025.
The team is a perfect mix of youth and experience, and we cannot wait to see the Men in Blue bring home another piece of silverware!
Miscellaneous Highlights: The HITMAN, Rohit Sharma, will be at the helm of the Indian team to thrill the fans again.
Virat Kohli is also back as the RO-KO pair is ready to weave their magic.
Dilshan Madushanka, the Mumbai Indiansâ€™ pacer, will look to continue his purple patch from the ODI World Cup where he picked up 21 wickets from nine matches.
His best figures of 5/80 in the event came against India.
Others: The ODI series between Sri Lanka and India will start on Friday, August 2, and will go on till Wednesday, August 7, 2024.
The head-to-head records in ODIs between Sri Lanka and India show that India has won 99 matches out of 168, while Sri Lanka has won 57 matches out of 168.

The most runs scored by a Sri Lankan batsman in ODIs against India is 2899 runs by Sanath Jayasuriya, while the most runs scored by an Indian batsman in ODIs against Sri Lanka is 3113 runs by Sachin Tendulkar.

The most wickets taken by a Sri Lankan bowler in ODIs against India is 74 wickets by Muthiah Muralidaran, while the most wickets taken by an Indian bowler in ODIs against Sri Lanka is 66 wickets by Zaheer Khan.
